title: ICompositeCurveFeatureData.ISetEntitiesToJoin
description: Sets the entities to join to create this composite curve.

parameters.name: Ents
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of entities (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

remarks:
The entities can be edges, reference curves other than composite curves, projection curves, and sketch entities.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
